name: Pushing Attack
summary: Your eidolon has an attack that pushes away enemies.
description:
Your eidolon has an attack that pushes away enemies. Choose one of the eidolon's unarmed attacks with the shove trait. It gains the Push action for that attack.Traits

Evolution: Feats with this trait affect your eidolon instead of you, typically by granting it additional physical capabilities.
